headline: Morgan Stanley Weighs M&A Leadership With Funding, Technology And Inclusion Bets
summary: Morgan Stanley (NYSE:MS) recently led global mergers and acquisitions advisory rankings in the power sector for 2025. The firm reported strong fourth quarter and full year results, supported by wealth management, investment banking, and a record margin in its Wealth Management arm. The company is investing in artificial intelligence and digital assets as part of its future business strategy. Morgan Stanley also highlighted its focus on inclusion and community impact through its Inclusive &...

headline: Why The Bumble BMBL Story Is Shifting As Valuation And Expectations Reset
summary: Bumble’s latest valuation update trims fair value from US$4.89 to US$4.56 per share and pairs it with a slightly higher discount rate of 11.59%. This combination points to more cautious expectations being built into current models. With revenue growth now modelled as a 5.05% decline instead of a 4.96% decline, this reset reflects analysts giving the quality-first product revamp more time to prove itself while keeping forecasts grounded in recent Q3 learnings. Stay tuned to see how you can...
